title: Harrowing
body: Anybody have any idea when the harrowing starts this year?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I don't have any details on upcoming or unannounced events until it's actually live.  Keep an eye out on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for any new details!  
http://cdn.gifbay.com/2012/10/2spooky_4_u-3914.gif
